## CommandParams interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CommandParams extends ViewExtensionManagerParams
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [isEditable](./core-types.commandparams.iseditable.md) | <code>() =&gt; boolean</code> | Returns true when the editor can be edited and false when it cannot.<!-- -->This is useful for deciding whether or not to run a command especially if the command is resource intensive or slow. |
